title.en: Inaho-kun wa Nise Kanojo no Hazu na no ni

altTitles.ja: 稲穂くんは偽カノジョのはずなのに

altTitles.ja-ro: Inaho-kun Wa Nise Kanojou No Hazu Nanoni

altTitles.en: Inaho-kun Is Supposed to Be a Fake Sweetheart

description.en:
Mori Shintaro, a new first-year student, yearns for the sparkling high school life of having a girlfriend and experiencing youth, but is ridiculed by those around him. His classmate, Inaho Sawatari, entered the school as the top student and is a highly regarded beauty. The two are not supposed to cross paths, but after an incident where they are mistaken for a couple, Inaho makes an unexpected proposal:
"Shall we pretend that we're really dating?"

---
**Notes:**
- The pre-serialization series is [Houkago no Cinderella-kun](https://mangadex.org/title/147b8fd6-5232-45df-993f-35c908cf41a2/houkago-no-cinderella-kun).

(from ebookjapan):

Shizuka Katsuragi is a female detective who loves silencers. She is assigned to the "annex" of the Community Safety Division, a hive of activity in the Tokyo Metropolitan Police Department.

 Her partner is Kenya Iha, the most eccentric person in the Metropolitan Police Department. The pairing of the two is a strange one, as they both pull each other down. 

With the policy of "conquer poison with poison," her beloved gun quietly blows fire today...

description.en: Fuuko is an UNLUCKY girl that causes bad luck to anyone she touches. As she prepares to face her death, Andy, an UNDEAD who desperately wants to die appears before her! Realizing her potential, he decides to use Fuuko's power to gives himself a permanent death, but then a certain organization goes after them…

altTitles.th: กินจุทะลุเลเวล

description.en:
Kang Minhyuk suffers from a rare disorder that makes it impossible for him to stop eating. Despite strict diet and exercise, Minhyuk’s weight is now life-threatening. As a last resort, his doctor recommends a unique treatment—Athenae, a VR game where one can eat as much as they want without consequence. Crispy fried chicken! Scrumptious samgyetang! Inside Athenae, all food tastes real, but earning it is no cakewalk. In order to live, Minhyuk must go on the ultimate fantasy gourmet adventure!

description.id:
Menderita penyakit langka di mana hanya ada dua orang penderita di seluruh dunia, Minhyuk harus hidup sambil mengontrol nafsu makannya. Segala cara sudah dicoba untuk mengurangi berat badan Minhyuk, namun itu hanya semakin membuatnya lapar hingga dokter pribadinya menyarankan 'Athenae'. Sebuah VR Game di mana pemainnya bisa makan sepuasnya di dalam sana tanpa khawatir berat badan naik. Begitulah petualangan Minhyuk dimulai, tentu saja ditemani makanan-makanan lezat pada setiap quest-nya!

description.it:
personaggio principale è colpito da una rara condizione che colpisce solo due persone in tutto il mondo, la bulimia. Organizza i suoi pasti quotidiani per sopravvivere, ma la sua speranza di sopravvivenza si affievolisce con il passare dei giorni. Consulta un medico, che gli suggerisce di giocare al gioco della realtà alternativa "Athenae", dove può mangiare quanto vuole senza ingrassare. Gioca per salvarsi la vita e crescere in forza non facendo altro che mangiare! Una vita fantastica da gourmet!

サクサクのチキン、伸びるチーズのピザ、夜中の1時に食べるラーメン！ ただおいしいものが食べたいだけなのに… 「暴食欠如症」どれだけ食べても食欲が満たされない奇病。 俺はこの病気のせいで体重170キロの巨漢になり、とうとう生命まで危なくなってしまう！ そこで新しい治療法として仮想現実ゲーム「アテネ」をすることに。 そこでは味が感じられて、おまけにラーメン100杯食べても太らない世界！ たくさん食べたい一心でプレイしていただけなのに、どんどんレベルアップしていって…!?

คังมินฮยอก เป็นผู้ป่วยโรคกินไม่หยุด หนึ่งในโรคหายากที่มีแค่ไม่กี่คนในโลก
เขาต้องออกกำลังกายและควบคุมอาหารในแต่ละวันอย่างยากลำบากเพื่อให้มีชีวิตรอด
แต่แล้วหมอก็แนะนำวิธีการรักษาแบบใหม่ด้วยการเล่นเกมออนไลน์เสมือนจริง ""อาเธเน่"" ที่ผู้เล่นสามารถรับรู้รสชาติอาหารในเกมได้
เรื่องราวการผจญภัยแสนอร่อยชวนน้ำลายสอของมินฮยอกจึงเริ่มต้นขึ้น!

敏赫身高185cm，他控制食量，每天运动4个小时，可他的体重却只能控制在170kg。他家境优渥、成绩优异，各方面都很完美，除了体重。这都是因为他患有罕见的暴食性缺失症。不管吃多少东西，他都无法得到满足。完美体验味觉感受的虚拟现实游戏——雅典，也许是可以解救他的最后一把钥匙？！

description.zh-hk:
主角患有全世界只有兩名患者的
罕見疾病——「暴食型飽足感缺失症」，
為了活下去，他每日努力控制飲食，
卻仍看不見希望。

在醫生的建議下，
他進入了虛擬實境遊戲《雅典奈》，
在遊戲裡，就算盡情大吃也不會變胖。
為了活下去而開始玩遊戲的他，
展開了一段美食雲集的奇幻人生!

description.en: In the dismal world where humans live together with hybrids everything becomes more distorted day by day. Yvas is a teenager who happens to work as an assassin for an agency established by the government. However, after an incident between them and his friend, Yvas and his partner Alissa swear to destroy the agency and become free from it. Everything becomes even more complicated when Yvas dies and comes back to life with a strange power called ""awakening"". Due to circumstances Yvas becomes a target of multiple underground groups.
description.fr: Dans un monde lugubre où les humains cohabitent avec les hybrides, tout devient de plus en plus déformé chaque jour. Yvas est un jeune qui se retrouve à travailler comme assassin pour une agence établie par le gouvernement pour exterminer les gangs de rue. Cependant, après un incident entre eux et ses amis, Yvas et sa partenaire Alissa jurent de détruire l’agence et de s’en libérer.
description.es-la: En el sombrío mundo en el que los humanos comparten su existencia con híbridos, la distorsión crece día a día. Yvas, un adolescente, se ve obligado a desempeñar el papel de asesino para una agencia respaldada por el gobierno. Sin embargo, tras un incidente con un amigo, Yvas y su compañera Alissa juran destruir la agencia y liberarse de sus ataduras. La situación se complica cuando Yvas muere y resucita con un extraño poder denominado "despertar". Debido a circunstancias particulares, Yvas se convierte en blanco de múltiples grupos clandestinos.

Psycho Suspense: A Cruel God Reigns

description.en:
A Savage God Reigns portrays the tale of two step-brothers – Jeremy and Ian – as they strive to discover their separate paths towards redemption.  
 
---
- **Won the 1st Osamu Tezuka Cultural Prize Excellence Award in 1997**
description.ja: 友達に恵まれ、ボランティアと勉強に励む幸せな生活を送っていたジェルミの日常は、ある男との出会いで一変する。母・サンドラの婚約者で大金持ちの英国紳士・グレッグ。ジェルミの苦痛に満ちた地獄の日々が始まった
description.vi:
Sự hy sinh điên rồ đã kéo cậu bé Jeremy xuống vực thẳm, lang thang vô định và đánh mất tiếng nói. Liệu rằng Jeremy có bao giờ trở về được thế giới loài người?

Đến với "Ngự trị ta, vị chúa tàn bạo - Zankokuna Kami Ga Shihaisuru" để cùng Jeremy và những người cậu yêu thương thoát khỏi khu rừng hỗn độn giữa tình yêu và bạo lực, tìm ra con đường giữa lằn ranh sinh tử.

Sau cùng, liệu con người có thể thoát khỏi vị chúa tàn bạo vẫn hằng ngự trị chúng ta? Hy vọng bạn sẽ theo dõi đến cùng và tìm được câu trả lời cho riêng mình.

description.en:
There are gamblers out there who even bet their lives as ante. But to secure the integrity of these life-threatening gambles, a violent and powerful organization by the name of “Kakerou” referees these games as a neutral party. Follow Baku Madarame a.k.a. Usogui (The Lie Eater) as he gambles against maniacal opponents at games – such as Escape the Abandoned Building, Old Maid, and Hangman – to ultimately “out-gamble” and control the neutral organization of Kakerou itself.  


---

**Links:**  
- [OAV on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=14163)
description.ru:
Есть игроки, которые ставят на кон свою жизнь. Чтобы сохранить целостность таких смертельно-опасных игр, жестокая и могущественная организация «Кагэро» судит их, как нейтральная сторона.
Наш герой — Баку Мадарамэ, «Пожиратель лжи». Игрок, чья цель — переиграть и в конце взять под контроль саму нейтральную организацию «Кагэро».

---

(Source: [readmanga](https://mintmanga.live/pojiratel_lji))
description.es-la: Hay jugadores que incluso apuestan su vida como apuesta. Pero para asegurar la integridad de estas apuestas que ponen en peligro la vida, una violenta y poderosa organización llamada "Kakerou" arbitra estos juegos como parte neutral. Sigue a Baku Madarame, también conocido como Usogui (El Devorador de Mentiras), mientras se enfrenta a oponentes maníacos en juegos como "Escapar del Edificio Abandonado", "La Vieja Doncella" y "El Ahorcado", para acabar jugando más que la propia organización neutral de Kakerou

altTitles.vi: Dù thế nào đi nữa / đó là tình bạn Naniwa

description.en: Guruguru Osaka, crackling ring! Now, the piston in my crotch is tingling!! I like picking up girls more than having three meals. Naniwa's youthful pleasure of being popular and having sex. I'm not a fart with a big loan either. I want to buy a new Silvia. I don't have the skill (technique), but I can't give up on my lewd spirit. An 18-year-old boy is making his ring debut!!

Billionaire Tono Ryuichi, the President of Tono Foods Group, a giant food company, recently acquired two young female assassins from the Mexican cartel. Sui and Ai came from unimaginably poor childhoods and was given a choice between killing people or selling their body. They chose the former and went through an inconceivably extreme training and, at 17 years old, they have become one of the deadliest assassins in the world. They are absolutely obedient to their master and they are given the task of finding the killer that poisoned Ryuichi's wife and child. They begin attending high school to blend into society and, at the same time, read and study which helps them become even more deadlier on the field. Sui and Ai encounter Matoba Imari who is a high school assassin herself and may be more skilled than both of them. But unlike the two, Imari just wants to lead a normal life. Whatever Imari wishes for her life is not their problem because the only thing Sui and Ai feeds on are bloodthirst and a challenge.
description.ja: 青年実業家の透野隆一は南米のマフィアから2人の美少女殺し屋を買い付ける。翠と藍と名付けられた彼女たちは透野の命令で、彼の妻子を殺した人間を狩ることに。だがその道行きで別の殺し屋女子たちと出会い、事態は思わぬ方向へ加速していくのだった…。青年実業家の透野隆一は南米のマフィアから2人の美少女殺し屋を買い付ける。翠と藍と名付けられた彼女たちは透野の命令で、彼の妻子を殺した人間を狩ることに。だがその道行きで別の殺し屋女子たちと出会い、事態は思わぬ方向へ加速していくのだった…。
description.vi: Tono Ryuichi, người đứng đầu Tono Foods Group, sở hữu trong tay một chuỗi các nhà hàng hạng sang đắt tiền tại Nhật Bản. Một ngày nọ, anh quyết định đến Mexico mua cho mình hai cô gái sát thủ trẻ được nuôi dưỡng bởi Mafia, với mục đích tìm cho ra kẻ đã hãm hại vợ và con của mình. Anh đặt tên cho cả hai là Sui (THÚY) và Ai (LAM). Sau khi chuyển đến Tokyo, Sui và Ai được Tono cho theo học tại một trường tư thục, nơi cả hai được thỏa thích đọc sách để nâng cao kiến thức để trau dồi thêm kỹ năng ám sát của mình. Tại đây, họ gặp được Matoba Imari, vốn cũng là sát thủ, thậm chí có phần còn giỏi hơn cả hai. Nhưng không giống họ, Imari chỉ muốn có một cuộc sống bình thường. Dẫu vậy, bất chấp mong muốn của Imari, những gì Sui và Ai quan tâm lại chỉ có mùi tanh của máu và những vụ săn giết thỏa mãn được bản tính ưa thách thức của họ.

description.en:
Feelings may come and go, but true love always remains in the heart. Tsumiki Miniwa is in love with her best friend, Io Otonashi. For her, confessing is nearly impossible; but to her friends, they seem to be the perfect match. Cute and petite, Tsumiki comes off more as a friend, and Io's attitude toward her is friendlier than toward others. Despite the constant teasing and obvious hints that his friends have been dropping, Io always seems to miss the signs.  
  
Throughout her everyday school life, Tsumiki spends time with her friends and Io. Will she finally muster enough courage to confess her true feelings?

description.en: Momoka has become a woman nearing her thirties with zero romance experience. Frustrated by this situation, she discovers the existence of "lesbian sex services" while searching for online encounters. Momoka decides to use it, interested in having sex with a lesbian sex worker called "Riko." Riko agrees to meet her, but has a secret …?

description.az: Bu twitter qısa hekayəsi məktəbdən kənarda oğlan kimi səhv saldığı orta məktəbli qızla onun sinif yoldaşı arasındakı sevgi hekayəsini təsvir edir. Nəhayət,qızlar rok musiqisindəki ortaq zövqləri üzərində birləşirlər.
description.en:
Fashionable and upbeat high schooler Aya falls head over heels for an employee at a local CD shop. He’s got an air of mystery about him, always dressed well, and has impeccable taste in music. Little does she know — this supposedly male employee is actually her female classmate Mitsuki!

Mitsuki generally keeps to herself, but since her seat is right next to Aya’s, she can't help but be extremely aware of the other’s crush. Revealing the truth is out of the question — but perhaps getting closer to Aya wouldn’t be so bad...

***Overwhelming winner in the Web category of the 2023 Tsugimanga Awards (by Kadokawa).***
description.fr:
Une histoire très appréciée sur Twitter sur fond de musique de Rock.

Aya, une populaire lycéenne tombe sous le charme du discret vendeur du magasin de musique qu'elle fréquente.

Retour en classe, elle raconte toute l'histoire à ses amies et comment elle a un faible pour ce garçon aux airs de prince charmant.

Ce qu'elle ne sait pas c'est que ce mystérieux vendeur n'est en fait que sa voisine de bureau, Mitsuki, qu'elle a confondu pour un jeune homme.

Comment leur relation va-t-elle évoluer ? Arriveront-elles à expliquer ce quiproquo ?
description.id:
Series Pendek Twitter yang menggambarkan cerita tentang Gyaru dan Teman Sekelasnya.
Gyaru yang suka musik rock dan sering mendatangi toko kaset jatuh cinta ke pekerja paruh waktu yang bekerja disitu, tapi sedikit dia tahu ternyata pekerjanya itu perempuan dan teman sekelasnya.
description.tr: Süslünün tekinin hoşlandığı çocuk aslında sınıftaki sessiz kız çıkıyor.
description.uk: Популярна серія коротких манґ у твіттері, в якій розповідається про історію кохання між ґяру та її однокласницею, яку вона помилково сприймає як хлопця поза школою, через їхню взаємну любов до рок-музики.
description.es-la: Aya, una estudiante de secundaria alegre y de moda, se enamora perdidamente de un empleado de una tienda de CD local. Tiene un aire de misterio, un gran estilo y un gusto musical impecable. Lo que ella no sabe es que...
description.pt-br:
Uma Gyaru/Gal que não se parece tanto com suas amigas (Gyarus também) frequenta uma loja de CD's e se apaixona pelo funcionário(?) de meio período do local.
Mas mal sabe ela que o funcionário(?) na realidade é uma menina e é uma das suas colegas de classe.

description.en: Yajima has been able to see spirits since he was small. At his new school is a room that nobody else can see. And inside is a spirit who loves playing video games.
description.fr: Yajima est capable de voir les esprits depuis qu'il est tout petit. Dans sa nouvelle école, il y a une pièce que personne d'autre ne peut voir. Et à l'intérieur se trouve un esprit qui aime jouer aux jeux vidéo. Une nouvelle saga d'exorcistes modernes commence !
description.ja: 幼少の頃から「幻妖」と呼ばれる存在が見えた少年・夜島学郎。高校入学初日、ひょんなことから出会ったサブカル好きの幻妖「鵺」に校内の幻妖退治を依頼されるが――…？
description.vi: Yajima đã có thể nhìn thấy các linh hồn từ khi còn nhỏ. Tại ngôi trường mới của cậu ấy có một căn phòng mà không ai khác có thể nhìn thấy. Và bên trong là một linh hồn thích chơi trò chơi điện tử. Một câu chuyện trừ tà hiện đại bắt đầu từ giây phút này!
description.pt-br: Yajima é capaz de enxergar Espíritos desde pequeno. Em sua nova escola há uma sala que mais ninguém consegue ver. E dentro dela mora uma Espírito que ama jogar videogames. Uma nova saga moderna de exorcistas começa agora!

description.en:
There exists an evil organisation that intends to invade planet Earth.  
  
The man called "General" fights everyday against the Earth's Defence Force, the "Rangers!"  
  
However, today is his day off.

---
Notes:

Additional Official English Release: [Comikey](https://comikey.com/comics/mr-villains-day-off-manga/231/) | [Square Enix](https://squareenixmangaandbooks.square-enix-games.com/en-us/series/mr-villains-day-off)
description.pt-br:
Existe uma organização maligna que almeja invadir o planeta Terra.

Um de seus membros, o General, luta todo dia contra as Forças Defensivas da Terra, mais conhecidos como Os Rangers.

Porém, hoje é o dia de folga dele.

---
Panini : [Dia de folga do vilão](https://panini.com.br/os-dias-de-folga-do-vilao-01)

description.en: Seventeen year old Aya is the perfect high school student. Good grades, popular and sports prodigy. She is looking forward to summer break as her pen pal has invited her to his family ranch, but one day on the way home from school she hears a voice calling her name from....

Rebirth is just a starting point from reaching the peak. Intruding crypt, the rise of martial arts  
  
The main character Fang Ping gets send back 10 years into a parallel world, resembling his own in everything, but the fact that martial arts is omnipresent and necessary to gain a bright future… (Note: Story plays in 2006)  
  
Will Fang Ping reach his goal? And become a mighty Martial Artist to finance his Adorable Little Sisters Empire? Or will he fall and hit his head on a block of tofu and die…?   
  
Find it out yourself, and read the manhua!
description.pt-br: O renascimento é apenas um ponto de partida para atingir o pico. Intrusão na cripta, a ascensão das artes marciais O personagem principal Fang Ping é enviado de volta 10 anos para um mundo paralelo, semelhante ao seu em tudo, mas o fato de que as artes marciais são onipresentes e necessárias para obter um futuro brilhante... Será que Fang Ping alcançará seu objetivo? meta? E se tornar um poderoso Artista Marcial para financiar seu Adorável Império das Irmãzinhas? Ou ele vai cair e bater a cabeça em um bloco de tofu e morrer…? Descubra você mesmo e leia o manhua!

description.en:
Gol D. Roger, a man referred to as the "Pirate King," is set to be executed by the World Government. But just before his demise, he confirms the existence of a great treasure, One Piece, located somewhere within the vast ocean known as the Grand Line. Announcing that One Piece can be claimed by anyone worthy enough to reach it, the Pirate King is executed and the Great Age of Pirates begins.  
  
Twenty-two years later, a young man by the name of Monkey D. Luffy is ready to embark on his own adventure, searching for One Piece and striving to become the new Pirate King. Armed with just a straw hat, a small boat, and an elastic body, he sets out on a fantastic journey to gather his own crew and a worthy ship that will take them across the Grand Line to claim the greatest status on the high seas.

---

**Note:**  
**Because a takedown notice was sent to MangaDex from the owners of this series, English fan translations of One Piece are unable to be posted at this time. The series can be read in its entirety at [the official Shonen Jump website,](https://www.viz.com/shonenjump/chapters/one-piece) with the first and latest three chapters available at any time and the rest accessible with a Shonen Jump membership (which costs about $2 a month and can be accessed via a VPN if you are outside the US). The three most recent chapters can also be read on MangaPlus for free by clicking the chapter links below.**

---
- **The Best-Selling Manga in History**
- **Won the 41st Japan Cartoonists Association Award Grand Prize alongside Neko Darake in 2012** 
- **Received the Kumamoto Prefecture Honorary Prize in 2018**
description.es: Hace veintidós años, el legendario pirata, Gold D. Roger fue ejecutado. Sus últimas palabras fueron que su tesoro conocido como "One Piece" estaba escondido en algún lugar dentro del vasto océano conocido como Grand Line. Esto dio inicio a la Era de los Piratas. Ahora, Monkey D. Luffy, un joven que, inspirado por su ídolo de la infancia emprende su viaje buscando el One Piece y convertirse en el Rey de los Piratas.
description.ru: Последние слова, произнесённые Королем Пиратов Гол Д. Роджером перед казнью, вдохновили многих выйти в море: «Мои сокровища? Я завещаю их тому, кто сможет их найти. Ищите! Я все оставил в одном месте!». Лишённые сна и покоя люди ринулись на Гранд Лайн, самое опасное место в мире. Так началась великая эра пиратов… Но с каждым годом романтиков становилось все меньше, их постепенно вытесняли прагматичные пираты-разбойники, которым награбленное добро было куда ближе, чем какие-то «никчёмные мечты». Но вот, одним прекрасным днем, семнадцатилетний Монки Д. Луффи исполнил заветную мечту детства - отправился в море. Его цель — ни много, ни мало стать новым Королём Пиратов. За достаточно короткий срок юному капитану удаётся собрать команду, состоящую из не менее амбициозных искателей приключений. И пусть ими движут совершенно разные устремления, главное, этим ребятам важны не столько деньги и слава, сколько куда более ценное – принципы и верность друзьям. И ещё – служение Мечте. Что же, пока по Гранд Лайн плавают такие люди, Великая Эра Пиратов всегда будет с нами!
description.uk:
Король піратів Ґолд Роджер буде страчений Світовим урядом. Прямо перед смертю він підтвердив існування великого скарбу «Ван Піс», який знаходиться десь на величезному морі Ґранд Лайн. Як тільки Роджер сказав, що будь-хто гідний досягти Ван Пісу може забрати його собі, його стратили, і почалася Велика ера піратів.

Двадцять два роки потому, молодий хлопець на ім’я Монкі Д. Луффі готовий почати свою пригоду по пошуку Ван Пісу та здобуванню титулу Короля піратів. Маючи при собі солом’яну шапку, невеличкий човен та еластичне тіло, він вирушає у неймовірну подорож, щоб зібрати собі команду та хороший корабель, який зможе пронести їх через весь Ґранд Лайн, щоб стати найвеличнішими в усіх морях.
description.es-la: Hace veintidós años, el legendario pirata, Gold D. Roger fue ejecutado. Sus últimas palabras fueron que su tesoro conocido como "One Piece" estaba escondido en algún lugar dentro del vasto océano conocido como Grand Line. Esto dio inicio a la Era de los Piratas. Ahora, Monkey D. Luffy, un joven que, inspirado por su ídolo de la infancia emprende su viaje buscando el One Piece y convertirse en el Rey de los Piratas.
description.pt-br: One Piece começa quando Gol D. Roger, o Rei Dos Piratas que possuiu tudo nesse mundo, antes de ser executado, diz que escondeu o seu tesouro em algum lugar da Grand Line, um oceano extremamente perigoso. Desde então muitos piratas se aventuram pela Grand Line para tentar encontrar o tesouro chamado One Piece. Um deles é Monkey D. Luffy, o garoto que, acidentalmente, comeu uma das Akuma No Mi, a Gomu Gomu No Mi (Fruta da Borracha), e agora ele pode esticar seu corpo como se fosse uma borracha. A jornada dele começa atrás de companheiros e um barco, que ele vai conseguindo pouco a pouco, pois tem um objetivo: Ser o Rei Dos Piratas!!

description.en:
The protagonist fell asleep while playing an online game. However, he awoke in a strange world with his game character's appearance. In a state of shock, he noticed that he was equipped with nothing but his strongest weapon and armor. To make matters worse, our hero's appearance was changed by the special avatar skin『Skeleton』when he enter this new world. The protagonist wanted to live without drawing attention, but he got acquainted with the dark elf Ariana and received her request.  
  
- [Official English Light Novel](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/series/skeleton-knight-in-another-world-light-novel/)
description.uk: Одного разу головний герой грав у відеогру, поки він не заснув...й коли він прокинувся, опинився в ігровому світі в образі свого аватара, як скелет! Оснащений потужною зброєю та обладунками аватара, але застрягши у страхітливій зовнішності, Арк повинен знайти місце для себе в цьому дивовижному світі. Усі його сподівання на тихе життя розвіюються, коли він зустрічається з прекрасною ельфійкою воїном, після чого вони разом подорожують цим світом.
description.pt-br:
Arc, um jovem jogador, desmaia durante uma partida online e quando desperta se depara em um mundo estranho, muito semelhante ao do jogo. Chocado com o ocorrido, ele percebe que está neste mundo munido de uma armadura e uma poderosa arma, além de poderes e aparência modificada para a de um [Caveiro]. Arc precisa se manter vivo e, para isso, não deve chamar a atenção. Porém, ele acaba encontrando uma elfa chamada Ariana e aceitando o seu pedido.

- [Original WebNovel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n6266ci/)

description.en:
Raised to kill like a pack of loyal hounds, the Baskerville children took countless lives as a band of fearsome assassins.

Despite being the shunned illegitimate son of the brood, Vikir served his family faithfully, only to meet his untimely demise at his father’s hands. But when he is inexplicably reborn with a second chance at life, Vikir, armed with the memories and knowledge of his past, swears to rise above the pack and take his revenge.

This time, he's ready to bite the hand that feeds.
description.pt-br:
Criados para matar como uma matilha de cães leais, as crianças Baskerville tiraram inúmeras vidas como um bando de assassinos temíveis.

Apesar de ser o filho ilegítimo rejeitado da ninhada, Vikir serviu sua família fielmente, apenas para encontrar sua morte prematura nas mãos de seu pai. Mas quando ele inexplicavelmente renasce com uma segunda chance na vida, Vikir, armado com as memórias e o conhecimento de seu passado, jura se elevar acima da matilha e se vingar.

Desta vez, ele está pronto para morder a mão que o alimenta.

description.en: Stowing himself away on a slave ship, Julian sets sail for the great continent with a hundred slaves, all yearning for freedom, until...?! Embark on a groundbreaking journey through this action-packed dark fantasy saga!!
description.fr: Julian, un jeune esclave, s’embarque clandestinement sur un navire en quête de liberté. Il ne se doute pas de ce qui l’attend dans ces eaux maudites…
description.ru: Пробравшись на невольничий корабль, Юлиан отправляется на континент вместе с сотней рабов, жаждущих свободы... Но что ждёт его впереди?!
description.vi: Lén đi lậu trên một con tàu, Julian ra đi tìm đến đại lục cùng với một trăm người nô lệ khác... Ai ai cũng khao khát có được tự do, thế nhưng rồi...?!

description.en: Otogi Katsura has had a reputation for being a beautiful girl at school since she entered the school. She is also named president of the class committee, but the vice president, Ichi (Ninomae), is also reputed to be a pretty boy. Unlike her public face, Otogi Katsura is an outspoken character and a martial artist in her own right. She is attracted to the perfect Ichi, who is also perfect on the inside, but she wonders if he also has a dark side.

altTitles.en: I Will Politely Decline the Male Lead!

altTitles.mn: Би эелдэгээр эрэгтэй гол дүрээс татгалзах болно!

description.en:
A girl obsessed with a novel suddenly finds herself transported into the thick of the plot. The problem is, she has taken on the role of the villain in the story. And she knows how this ends… it's off with her head! Maybe she'll just let this play out and wake up back in reality… But after a few too many deaths to no avail, it's finally time to go off-script. She's going to have a little fun with this tale. She's made up her mind… to live!

---
**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.bomtoon.tw/detail/namju_RJ)
* [French / Français](https://www.delitoon.com/detail/daf_1000570)

description.fr:
Condamnée à mourir le jour de ses 20 ans puis à ressusciter encore et toujours pour l'éternité, c'est là, sa malédiction. Mais quitte à voir son avenir ruiné, autant vivre comme on le souhaite! La méchante est bien décidée à suivre cet adage et a changé l'histoire du roman où elle se trouve. L'héroïne, sa rivale? Plus question! Elle est tellement adorable, plutôt en faire sa meilleure amie! Le fiancé? Un prince héritier cruel et idiot, mieux vaut l'éliminer du paysage. Cependant, à chacune de ses décisions s'éloignant de l'histoire originale, le futur se modifie. Jusqu'où va-t-elle bouleverser le cours du roman et tous ses personnages?

---

description.ko:
비참하게 처형당하는 소설의 악역으로 빙의했다.
사망플래그를 피하기 위해 별짓 다 해봤지만, 돌아오는 건 결국 죽음뿐.
세 번째 회귀하던 날, 나는 결심했다.
막 살기로!

“이렇게 살아도 죽고, 저렇게 살아도 살해당하는 판에
나 하고 싶은 대로 하고 살겠다!”

그러나 원작에서 너무 멀어진 탓일까.
원래대로라면 원작 여주에게 향했어야 할 남주들의 관심이
어째서인지 나한테 향하는 것 같다……?

---

description.uk:
Вона стала лиходійкою в романі, якій судилося жалісна смерть. У своєму першому житті вона пішла за оригінальною історією і померла. Потім знову прокинулась в тілі лиходійки. Під час наступної спроби вона робила все, щоб уникнути смерті, але врешті-решт її знову чекала лише вона.
Як би я не жила, все одно помру, чи не краще жити так, як хочеться?
Проте, щось я надто далеко відійшла від оригінального сюжету. Чому раптом головний герой зацікавився мною?...

---

description.zh-hk:
她在一部小說中被當作惡棍附身，在小說中被悲慘地處決。

我嘗試了一切來避免死亡標誌，但最終，只有死亡浮出水面。在第三次回歸的那天，我下定了決心。讓我們活下去吧！

"如果我這樣生活，我會死，如果我那樣生活，我會被殺！"

但這是因為它離原版太遠了嗎？主角對原版女主角的興趣似乎以某種方式針對了我......？

description.en:
Is he an eccentric or a hermit? Does the seemingly unremarkable company employee, Fujii, redefine the definition of "happiness"?

In the workplace, he's a plain middle-aged man who doesn't stand out. While he does his job properly, he's not one to waste words. Come quitting time, he disappears like a ghost. He's not the type to be invited to after-work drinks in the first place. More like, he's the guy who's thought of as "I wouldn't want to end up like that..." by his juniors.

Yet, he piques the curiosity of others... "I wonder how he was raised?", "Does he have friends or a girlfriend?", "What does he do on weekends?". Suddenly, you realize you've become captivated by Fujii... 

This elusive emotion that's hard to put into words is vividly captured by the author of "Reborn no Kishi" in this bewitching life drama!

altTitles.ja: ドールズフロントライン

description.en:
Based on the popular mobile strategy game from MICA Team.  
  
In the year 2030, "The Belian Island Incident" happened where a highly radioactive alien substance was accidentally exposed to the atmosphere, causing half the world's population to be killed or mutated into zombie-like creatures called ELID (Euroky Low-Emission Infectious Disease) and the land becoming contaminated and uninhabitable. 

In response to the world suffering a shortage of Manpower, highly advanced androids with superior strength and advanced AI capable of expressing emotions called A-Dolls (Autonomous Dolls) were created.  

When World War 3 broke out in 2045 to 2051 over uncontaminated land and resources, Private Military Companies used A-Dolls with the ability to fight called T-Dolls (Tactical Dolls) in the war, which made them rich, becoming the de facto police and military of many nations after the war ended. 

However, in 2061, T-Dolls of the world's largest PMC, Sangvis Ferri, suddenly rebelled, killed their human masters and attack nearby human settlements. In response, Grifon & Kryuger PMC and their T-Dolls were hired to stop and contain the Sangvis Ferri Forces.

description.en:
In a certain place, there are two neighboring high schools. Chidori High School, a bottom-feeder boys' school where idiots gather, and Kikyo Girls' School, a well-established girls' school. Rintaro Tsumugi, a strong and quiet second year student at Chidori High School, meets Kaoruko Waguri, a girl who comes as a customer while helping out at his family's cake shop. Rintaro feels comfortable spending time with Kaoruko, but she is a student at Kikyo Girls, a neighboring school that thoroughly dislikes Chidori High.
___
**Links:**
- [Official Twitter (JP)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10023/episode/320130) (U.S. Only | Simulpub)
description.fr:
Au cœur d'une banlieue japonaise, se dressent face à face deux établissements que tout oppose : Chidori, le lycée public pour garçons, réunit les pires cancres de la ville, tandis que le prestigieux Kikyô rassemble les esprits les plus brillants des filles de bonne famille.

Donnant régulièrement un coup de main à la pâtisserie familiale, Rintarô Tsumugi, élève à Chidori, sympathise avec l'une de ses clientes régulières, Kaoruko Waguri. Alors qu'il sent peu à peu un lien se tisser entre eux, le lycéen apprend que la jeune fille fréquente Kikyô et que comme tous les élèves de ces établissements, ils sont supposés se haïr mutuellement ! La rivalité entre leurs lycées est-elle forcément signe de fatalité ?
description.ja:
とある場所に、隣接するふたつの高校がある。バカが集まる底辺男子校・千鳥高校と、由緒正しきお嬢様校・桔梗女子。そこに通う紬 凛太郎と、和栗薫子が出会い…。
“近くて遠い”二人が織りなす、鮮やかな青春彩る学園物語!!

とある場所に、隣接するふたつの高校がある。バカが集まる底辺男子校・千鳥高校と、由緒正しきお嬢様校・桔梗女子。強面で物静かな千鳥高校2年・紬 凛太郎は、実家のケーキ屋の手伝い中にお客として来ていた少女・和栗薫子と出会う。薫子との時間を心地よく感じる凛太郎だったが、彼女は徹底して千鳥を嫌う桔梗女子の生徒で……!?

___
- [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
description.vi: Ở một nơi nào đó, có 2 trường cao trung lân cận. Cao trung Chidori, một trường nam sinh cấp thấp hội tụ đủ những thằng đần, trường nữ sinh Kikyo, một trường nữ sinh danh giá . Rintaro Tsugumi, một nam sinh năm 2 to khỏe và trầm tính tại trường Chidori, bắt gặp Kaoruko Waguri, một khách hàng khi cậu đang giúp việc tại cửa hàng bánh nhà mình . Rintaro cảm thấy thoải mái khi dành thời gian bên Kaoruko, nhưng cô lại là học sinh của trường Kikyo, ngôi trường hàng xóm cực kì căm ghét trường Chidori. Đây là câu chuyện về 2 con người ở rất gần nhưng lại rất xa
description.es-la:
En cierto lugar, hay dos escuelas secundarias vecinas. El instituto Chidori, una escuela masculina de mala muerte en la que se reúnen los idiotas, y el instituto femenino Kikyo, una escuela femenina bien establecida. Rintaro Tsumugi, un fuerte y tranquilo estudiante de segundo curso del instituto Chidori, conoce a Kaoruko Wakuri, una chica que llega como cliente mientras ayuda en la pastelería de su familia. Rintaro se siente cómodo pasando tiempo con Kaoruko, pero ella es alumna de las chicas de Kikyo, una escuela vecina a la que no le gusta nada el instituto Chidori. Esta es la historia de dos personas que están tan cerca y a la vez tan lejos.
___
- [Twitter Oficial (JA)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
description.pt-br: Em um lugar específico, existem duas escolas secundárias vizinhas. A Escola Secundária Chidori, uma escola para rapazes considerada de nível inferior, onde se reúnem estudantes menos dedicados, e a Escola para Meninas Kikyo, uma instituição bem estabelecida. Rintaro Tsumugi, um estudante do segundo ano forte e tranquilo da Escola Secundária Chidori, conhece Kaoruko Waguri, uma garota que aparece como cliente enquanto ajuda na confeitaria da sua família. Rintaro se sente à vontade passando tempo com Kaoruko, mas ela é uma aluna da Escola para Meninas Kikyo, uma escola vizinha que tem aversão à Escola Secundária Chidori. Esta é a história de duas pessoas que estão tão próximas e, ao mesmo tempo, tão distantes.

title.en: Charming the Duke of the North

altTitles.fr: Je vais séduire le Duc du Nord

altTitles.ja: 北部公爵を誘惑します

altTitles.vi: Kế hoạch là quyến rũ công tước phương bắc

description.en:
"Pretend to be my lover and join the social circle."

Selena, the top star that had the entire world's attention, was suddenly warped to Northern Duke's land during an accident while filming. Kalcion, the Northern Duke that saved her from the infernal beasts, offers Selena a chance to go back home in return for collecting information in various social circles by pretending to be his lover. Selena quickly accepts Kalcion's offer, but… 

"Why in the world can't you do this!?"

 "Don't you think that the answer to that should be obvious to you, the actress, not to me, the duke?"

There was a critical problem. The Northern Duke's acting skills are horrible!

"…Let's change the plan. I'll seduce you instead."

And thus the contractual relationship between the two started. Will Kalcion's acting skill improve first, or will he start to have true feelings for Selena instead?

---
Rinha, Korea's most beloved actress, gets into an accident while on set. When she regains consciousness, she realizes she has traveled to the Kingdom of Iklein and meets the northern duke Calcion, who saves her from a demonic beast. Calcion asks her to be his fake lover so she can get into socialite and discover the conspiracy happening in his castle.

---

description.fr:
«Prétendre être mon amant et rejoindre le cercle social.»

Selena, la top star qui avait l'attention du monde entier, a soudainement atterrit dans le pays du Duc du Nord lors d'un accident de tournage. Kalcion, le duc du Nord qui l'a sauvée des bêtes infernales, offre à Selena une chance de rentrer chez elle en échange de la collecte d'informations dans divers cercles sociaux en prétendant être son amant. Selena accepte rapidement l'offre de Kalcion, mais...

«Pourquoi diable ne pouvez-vous pas pas faire ça?»

«Ne pensez-vous pas que la réponse à cette question devrait être évidente pour vous, l'actrice, et non pour moi, le duc?»

Il y avait un problème crucial. Les compétences d'acteur du Duc du Nord étaient horribles!

«...Changeons de plan. Je vais vous séduire à la place.»

Et c'est ainsi que la relation contractuelle entre les deux commença. Le talent d'acteur de Kalcion va-t-il s'améliorer en premier, ou va-t-il commencer à éprouver de vrais sentiments pour Selena?

---
Selena, une super star sous les feux de la rampe, se retrouve par accident sur les terres du Duc du Nord alors qu'elle était en plein tournage. Kalcion, le duc, la sauve des bêtes sauvages qui la menacent et lui offre une chance de retourner dans son monde. En échange, elle doit se faire passer pour sa petite amie et glaner des informations sur les réseaux sociaux. Selena accepte la proposition du duc, mais le Duc du Nord est un très mauvais acteur. Selena se met donc en tête de le séduire pour que la réalité rattrappe la fiction et que leur relation paraisse vraisemblable.

---

description.ru:
Все внимание мира было приковано к главной звезде, Селене, которая в результате катастрофы в процессе съемок случайно попала на территории Северного Герцога. Спасенная от зверей-демонов Кальционом, Северным Герцогом, она получает от него предложение предоставлять ему информацию из разных светских кругов в качестве его мнимой любовницы. В обмен он вернет ее домой. Недолго думая, Селена соглашается, но что ждет ее дальше…

description.uk:
Селена, головна зірка, яка привернула увагу всього світу, раптово потрапила на землю Північного Герцога потрапив у аварію під час зйомок. Кальціон, північний герцог, який врятував її від божевільних звірів, пропонує Селені шанс повернутися додому в обмін на збір інформації в різних соціальних колах, прикидаючись його коханою. Селена швидко приймає пропозицію Кальціона, але… «Чому ви самі не можете цього зробити!?» «Чи не здається вам, що відповідь на це має бути очевидною для вас, акторки, а не для мене, герцога?» Виникла критична проблема. Акторські здібності північного герцога жахливі! «…Давайте змінимо план. Натомість я спокушу вас». І таким чином між ними почалися договірні відносини. Чи покращиться акторська майстерність Кальціона, чи натомість він почне відчувати справжні почуття до Селени?

description.vi:
Seolena, nữ minh tinh xinh đẹp hàng đầu thế giới. Một ngày nọ, khi đang quay phim thì cô bất ngờ gặp tai nạn.
Khi mở mắt ra thì đã ở một thế giới khác và chạm mặt với công tước phương Bắc. Để có thể sống sót, Seolena đã ký hợp đồng với công tước Kalcion.
Kalcion sẽ giúp cô trở về thế giới của mình, còn cô sẽ đóng giả làm người yêu hắn, giúp hắn tìm ra mối đe doạ đằng sau mình.
Nhưng…diễn xuất của công tước thật tệ hại. Cô đành phải quyến rũ công tước vậy. Sau nhiều chuyện xảy ra, ánh mắt của công tước nhìn cô trở nên khác thường.
Phải chăng diễn xuất của công tước đã tiến bộ hay thật sự có cảm tình với cô rồi…?

description.pt-br:
“Finja ser minha amante e participe dos círculos sociais.”

Selena, uma estrela que atraiu a atenção do mundo todo, repentinamente foi parar nas terras do Duque do Norte após um acidente durante as filmagens. 

Kalcion, o Duque do Norte, que a salvou de bestas infernais, oferece a ela chance de voltar para casa em troca de coletar informações em vários círculos sociais, fingindo ser sua amante. 

Selena aceitou rapidamente a oferta de Kalcion, mas…

“Por que diabos você não consegue fazer isso?!”

“Não acha que a resposta deveria ser óbvia para você a atriz, e não para mim, o duque?”

Surgiu um problema crítico. 

As habilidades de atuação do duque são terríveis!

“… Vamos mudar o plano. Em vez disso, vou seduzi-lo.”

E assim, a relação contratual entre os dois começou.

A habilidade de atuação de Kalcion irá melhorar primeiro, ou ele começará a ter sentimentos verdadeiros por Selena?

---

description.en: Reiji Saeki was living in a north-eastern countryside town and lost his life in an accident during summer vacation. But before he knew it, a mysterious ball of light appeared in front of his eyes in a world of whiteness. Being a magician from a parallel world, that ball of light is looking for someone qualified to inherit the magic they had created in order to prevent it from being lost. Reiji, who took on that suggestion, lives in the parallel world Elgin, with a new body and powerful magic.
description.ja: 事故死したはずの高校生・レイの前に姿を現した異世界の魔術師・ゼパイル。その後継者に選ばれたレイは、強力な魔力と伝説級のアイテム、そして相棒の魔獣セトとともに、異世界エルジィンで第二の生を歩み始める！

altTitles.zh-ro: Ai Yu Sha Yi Zhi Ye

altTitles.en: Night of Love and Murderous Intent

description.en: A decade ago, he was a beta at the pinnacle of his assassin career. But one day, while trying to save an Alpha child, he suffered severe injuries leading him to lose the sharpness and insight an assassin needs. Left with no choice, he retired and moved into a remote small town to start a new life under a new identity. Everything was going well until an unexpected visitor showed up at his house. The child he had saved years ago has now grown into the leader of an organization, and he’s coming after the beta with a powerful intent—

description.en:
After Sirone was abandoned in a stable, he was found by a family of hunters and raised in a loving home. 

Despite the hardships of the peasant life, he learned how to read from a young age and became obsessed with books, especially ones on the history of magic. One day, he has an unlikely encounter with a mage and learns how to enter the "spirit zone," the first step to learning how to use magic. 

Although they say only nobles can be mages, will Sirone be able to prove his infinite potential?

altTitles.en: Gags With All The Rockman Gang!!

description.en: A stupid gag comic featuring caricatures of characters from across the Mega Man franchises, focusing primarily on enthusiastic airhead EXE-kun, the matronly Guts Mama, and other characters from the then-current handheld titles.

altTitles.en: The Late Game Healer Is Way Too Strong

description.en:
South Korea’s top hunter, 'Mad Dog' Min Si-woo.

The moment he and his disciples defeated the Demon King! He was sent to another world, and after 100 years of battling in a monster-infested realm, he finally returned to Earth!

"But why has everyone forgotten about me?"

100 years in the other world was only 10 years on Earth. Now, a seasoned veteran hardened by a century of bloodshed, Min Si-woo sets out to find his lost disciples and uncover the reason behind his erasure!
description.ko:
대한민국 최상위 헌터, '광견' 민시우.

제자들과 마왕을 처치한 순간! 이계로 보내지고, 마물이 가득한 이계에서 100년 동안의 싸움 끝에 드디어 지구로 돌아왔다!

'그런데, 왜 내 존재가 사람들에게 잊힌 거지?'

이계에서의 100년은 지구에서의 10년이었고, 100년의 혈투로 '고인물'이 되어 돌아온 민시우는흩어진 제자들과 본인의 존재가 잊힌 이유를 찾아 나선다!

description.en: He got a cute girlfriend who was the first in his life, but her friend tempted him with a body that was lewder than her... What would you do if your girlfriend's friend pressed you like this?
description.ja: 人生で初めてできた、かわいい彼女。でもその友達は、彼女よりも豊満なカラダで僕を誘惑してきて…。彼女の友達にこんな風に迫られたら、あなたはどうしますか？
description.vi: Lần đầu tiên trong đời tôi có một cô bạn gái vô cùng dễ thương nhưng bạn cô ấy luôn cố dùng thân hình nóng bỏng của mình để cám dỗ tôi, phải làm sao đây?

description.en:
A duke's daughter, aged six, was being bullied by the servants when all of a sudden, she started to recall her past life. Emeliet realized that she had been reborn into the world of the novel that she had read in her past life, as the child of the main characters!

Three years after the novel's end, her mother had died while giving birth to her, and as a result, her father had abandoned her. In order to overcome her dire situation, Emeliet puts into motion her plan to get closer to her dad...

Will Emeliet overcome immense odds stacked against her and recover her dad's love?
description.ko:
시종들에게 괴롭힘을 당하던 어린 에멜리에트는
어느 날 불현듯 전생의 기억을 떠올리게 된다.
그리고 깨닫는다.
자신이 전생에 읽었던 책 속으로 환생했다는 것을.
그것도 주인공들의 아이로……!

소설의 엔딩으로부터 3년 뒤, 엄마는 자신을 낳다 죽었고
그로 인해 아빠는 하나뿐인 딸을 방치하고 있는 상황이었다.

‘계속 이렇게 살 순 없어!’

상황을 바꾸겠다고 마음 먹은 차 들려온, 아빠의 귀환 소식!
그런데…….

“저것이 왜 내 눈앞에 있는 것이냐.”

고대하던 첫만남에는 싸늘한 눈총만이 돌아 올 뿐이었다.

‘……그래도 포기 못해!’

에멜리에트는 본격! 아빠 꼬시기 작전에 돌입한다!

하나. 자주 마주치기
“파파 안뇽! 파파 오디 가?”

둘. 선물 공세
“파파~ 이거 줄게. 선물이야. 앞으로 친하게 지내자. 이제 매일 올게!”

셋. 칭찬하기!

“앗! 눈부셔~ 파파한테서 빛이 나서 가까이 못 가겠어.”

그런데 뭔가 이상하다.

“집무실.”
물어보는 대로 성실하게 다 대답해 주고,
“쓸모없는 걸 가져왔군.”
쓸모없다면서 고이 간직하고 있질 않나,
“……시끄럽다.”
칭찬엔 유독 부끄러워하는데 이거 정말 나 싫어하는 거 맞아?

description.en:
"Filipino Kaisen" takes place in the same universe as "Jujutsu Kaisen" however the story progresses on a different country named "Philippines" and the story follows the music loving "Juno Coralles"

Everything started when "Guanzon Public Highschool" announced a Field trip for the Grade 11 students specifically in Juno's section, However on the day of field trip before Juno departs his home, Juno's Mother gave him an "Anting - Anting" which is a cursed object and without juno knowing about it he wears it as a souvenir from his mother, then when Juno and his classmates in the Field trip bus are about enter their Destination, Several Cursed spirits disturbed their ride and most of the students were wondering why did the bus stopped, however there were two students who can see the Cursed spirits, which are Juno Coralles and Fred Dadansan, and with the help of the "Anting - Anting" Cursed Object, Juno is able to see cursed spirits, efficiently use Cursed energy and Awaken his Cursed Technique, both of them tried to defeat the cursed spirits and succeeded until a bigger threat arrived and two students from the "Luzon Sorcery Highschool" have arrived and starting here the journey of Juno Coralles in the World Of Sorcerery have Begun.
A parody of "Go! Ina Junior High Ping Pong Club" (The Ping Pong Club) with characters from "JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Part 5: Golden Wind".

Dam, who at some point stopped growing, avoids people and leaves to the forest.  
  
 [Author's twitter](https://twitter.com/dahongcomic)

altTitles.es-la: ¡¿Renací como el padre de la villana y necesito XXX para sobrevivir?!

altTitles.es: ¡¿Renací como el padre de la villana y necesito XXX para sobrevivir?!

altTitles.th: ฉันเกิดใหม่ในฐานะพ่อของวายร้ายและฉันต้องการ XXX เพื่อเอาชีวิตรอด!?
ราชาวายร้ายอย่างผมก็อยากจะรอดในเกมจีบหนุ่มนะครับ

description.en:
We all know the isekai formula. The MC is always some nobody, they wake up in a perfect body, and they always end up dominating their new world. Sure, Satoru got the first two tropes, but he sure didn’t choose to be reborn as an evil king in his ex-girlfriend’s otome game. He’ll have to quickly figure things out before the hero slays him and his villainess daughter…. all while dealing with sexy magicians, handsy kings and a craving for men’s… *ahem* spiritual energy. Forty-five might be a bit late for a sexual awakening, but better late than never, right?  
  
*Note: This is a all new original English comic.*  


---
description.es: Todos conocemos la fórmula isekai. El MC siempre es un don nadie, se despiertan con un cuerpo perfecto y siempre terminan dominando su nuevo mundo. Claro, Satoru obtuvo los dos primeros tropos, pero seguro que no eligió renacer como un rey malvado en el juego otome de su ex novia. Tendrá que resolver las cosas rápidamente antes de que el héroe lo mate a él y a su hija villana … todo mientras trata con magos sexys, reyes hábiles y un deseo por la energía espiritual de los hombres … * ejem *. Cuarenta y cinco puede ser un poco tarde para un despertar sexual, pero es mejor tarde que nunca, ¿verdad?

altTitles.ja: トランスフォーマーレジェンズ

title.en: S-Rank Party Kara Kaikosareta [Jugushi] ~"Noroi no Item" Shika Tsukuremasen ga, Sono Seinou wa Artifact-kyuu nari......!~

altTitles.ja: Ｓランクパーティから解雇された【呪具師】～『呪いのアイテム』しか作れませんが、その性能はアーティファクト級なり……！～

altTitles.en: I'm a Curse Crafter, and I Don't Need an S-Rank Party!
My S-Rank Party Fired Me for Being a Cursificer: I Can Only Make "Cursed Items", but They're Artifact Class!

altTitles.vi: Chỉ biết chế tạo trang bị nguyền rủa, tôi bị đuổi khỏi tổ đội cấp S

description.en: Gaile, a Cursificer, is left penniless when he's expelled from his party as soon as they reach S Rank. Apparently he wasn't contributing enough?! But they hadn't realized that his cursed items outperform even holy relics and legendary equipment! Gaile decides to try to make a living on his own off of his cursed items.
description.ja:
【呪具師】のゲイルは大して貢献していないと、パーティがＳランクに昇格したと同時に無一文で追い出される。しかし、彼らは理解していなかった。ゲイルの作る呪具は、そこらの聖遺物や勇者の装備をも凌駕する性能を誇っていたことに…。ゲイルは呪具を活かして一人で生きていこうと決意しーー。

風変わりな職業・呪具師の大活躍が新感覚の爽快感で大反響!!
description.vi: Gaile, một nguyền cụ sư tài năng, đã bị các đồng đội phản bội khi tổ đội đạt được hạng S. Họ không ngờ ràng các nguyền cụ của anh ta còn mạnh hơn cả thánh tích và các trang bị thần thoại. Sau khi bị đuổi khỏi tổ đội, Gaile quyết định tự mình kiếm sống bằng những nguyền cụ do mình tạo ra. Chuyến phiêu lưu của anh chàng nguyền cụ sư chính thức bắt đầu.
description.pt-br:
A versão mangá de um dos romances de fantasia isekai mais populares de Shousetsuka ni Narou!

Gaile, um Cursificer, fica sem um tostão quando é expulso de seu grupo assim que chegam ao Rank S. Aparentemente ele não estava contribuindo o suficiente?! Mas eles não tinham percebido que seus itens amaldiçoados superam até mesmo relíquias sagradas e equipamentos lendários!

Gaile decide tentar ganhar a vida por conta própria com seus itens amaldiçoados.

altTitles.ja: 新装版　動物のお医者さん

description.en: The humorous adventures of a veterinary student, his friends, and his dog, as they learn how to care for all kinds of animals.

altTitles.ja: 愛され天使なクラスメイトが、俺にだけいたずらに微笑む

altTitles.en: The Classmate Who Is Adored by Everyone Smiles Teasingly Only at Me

altTitles.pt-br: A Colega de Classe que é Adorada Por Todos Sorri Provocativamente Apenas Para Mim

altTitles.vi: Cô bạn cùng lớp được mọi người yêu mến chỉ trêu chọc mình tôi

altTitles.zh: 同班的天使只对我坏笑

description.en:
Girls and sweets are full of secrets!? 

Ichise Souma is a high school student who dreams of becoming a pastry chef and devotes himself to making sweets. He meets Satomi Chika, a female classmate, after receiving some sweets. 

Chika is a beautiful girl with a soothing personality, known at school as the “Angel of Peace.” Souma thought she was a good girl who would kindly listen to his worries about making sweets, but... 

"Ichise-san, your embarrassed face is really cute." 

Chika shows an unexpected side of herself only when they are alone, and Souma’s heart is on the verge of exploding! A sweet and stimulating boy-meets-girl story with a mischievous angel connected by sweets begins!
description.ja:
パティシエになることを夢見てお菓子作りにはげむ高校生・市瀬颯真。
彼はお菓子の差し入れをきっかけに、クラスメイトの女子・里見千佳と出会う。
千佳は校内で“安らぎの天使”と呼ばれる癒し系の美少女。
颯真のお菓子作りの悩みも優しく聞いてくれるいい子、だと思っていたのだが――

「……市瀬さんの恥ずかしがる顔って、すごく可愛いんですね」

ふたりきりの時だけ意外な一面を見せてくる千佳に、颯真の心は爆発寸前！
お菓子が結ぶいたずらな天使との、甘くて刺激的なボーイ・ミーツ・ガール、開幕！
description.vi:
Satomi Chika hay còn được gọi là [Thiên sứ hoà bình] vừa xinh đẹp vừa đáng yêu. Ichinose Souma là một chàng trai thích làm đồ ngọt.

Souma đã nhờ Chika nếm thử đồ ngọt mình làm và đổi lại cậu phải trông chừng cô bạn cùng lớp này.

"Tớ muốn làm thử rất nhiều thứ đấy."

"Ichinose-kun, khi xấu hổ mặt cậu đáng yêu lắm luôn."

Không biết vì sao một Chika đáng yêu, rụt rè lại trêu chọc Souma không thương tiếc. Thanh xuân của họ dần trở nên ngọt ngào hơn!?

Câu chuyện hài hước nhưng không kém phần lãng mạng giữa 'cô nàng thiên sứ tinh nghịch' và 'chàng trai mang ước mơ cháy bỏng' bắt đầu...
description.pt-br:
Meninas e doces estão cheios de segredos!? 

Ichise Souma é um estudante do ensino médio que sonha em ser confeiteiro e se dedica à confecção de doces. Ele conhece Satomi Chika, uma colega de classe, após receber alguns doces. 

Chika é uma linda garota com uma personalidade calmante, conhecida na escola como o “Anjo da Paz”. Souma achava que ela era uma boa garota que ouviria gentilmente suas preocupações sobre fazer doces, mas... 

"Ichise-san, seu rosto envergonhado é muito fofo." 

Chika mostra um lado inesperado de si mesma apenas quando estão sozinhos, e o coração de Souma está prestes a explodir! Começa uma doce e estimulante história de Garoto conhece Garota com um anjo travesso conectado por doces!

description.en:
The Yakuza boss is... a cat?! The "brown tiger" group boss, Oyaji. Yanagi, the new recruit in the Yakuza, and the gang members are once again at the mercy of the carefree Oyaji today... But it's not that bad. A lively comedy about a cat... Begins!!

The title "Like a Cat", or "Neko ga Gotoku", is a parody of the Yakuza game series' title which is "Like a Dragon" or "Ryu ga Gotoku".
description.pt-br:
O chefe da Yakuza é... um gato?! O chefe do grupo "tigre marrom", Oyaji. 
Yanagi, o novo recruta da Yakuza, e os membros da gangue estão mais uma vez à mercê do despreocupado Oyaji ... Mas não é tão ruim assim.
Uma animada comédia sobre um gato... Começa!!

O título Like a Cat, ou Neko ga Gotoku, é uma paródia do título da série de jogos Yakuza, que é Like a Dragon ou Ryu ga Gotoku.

title.en: Shuumatsu no Valkyrie Kitan - Jack the Ripper no Jikenbo

altTitles.ja: 終末のワルキューレ奇譚 ジャック・ザ・リッパーの事件簿

altTitles.en: The Jack the Ripper Case Files
Record of Ragnarok: The Jack the Ripper Case Files

altTitles.ru: Повесть о Конце Света: Досье Джека-потрошителя

altTitles.en: Record of Ragnarok Curious Tale: The Jack the Ripper Case Files

description.en:
In 1888, a number of prostitutes were murdered in London, by someone known only as "Jack the Ripper". The murderer takes to the streets each day, looking to slit some unfortunate woman open... The past of Jack the Ripper, the English gentleman who represented the human side in the fourth round of the struggle between God and mankind known as Ragnarok, who was one of the top-three most popular characters in the character poll, is finally revealed!
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [MangaHot](https://mangahot.jp/site/works/z_R0212)
description.ja: 『終末のワルキューレ』第4回戦人類代表ジャック・ザ・リッパー。霧の都ロンドンを、恐怖のどん底に落とし、人類が応援することさえ躊躇した狂喜の殺人紳士に隠された真実とは？

description.en:
A manga that revolves around an old-fashioned all-night food stall, the various dishes that the stall owner prepares to suit the tastes of different customers, and the joys, griefs, trials and tribulations of his faithful patrons.  
  
- Nominated for the 2nd Manga Taisho Award (2009)  
- Winner of the 39th Japan Cartoonist Awards Grand Prize (2010)
